sn35.138:1.2: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.138:1.4: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, na tumhakam; tam pajahatha.
sn35.138:1.5: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati …pe…
sn35.138:1.7: Sa vo pahina hitaya sukhaya bhavissati …pe…
sn35.138:1.9: So vo pahino hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.138:1.10: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yam imasmim jetavane tinakatthasakhapalasam tam jano hareyya va daheyya va yathapaccayam va kareyya, api nu tumhakam evamassa:
sn35.138:1.11: ‘amhe jano harati va dahati va yathapaccayam va karoti’”ti?
sn35.138:1.14: “Na hi no etam, bhante, atta va attaniyam va”ti.
sn35.138:1.15: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhu na tumhakam; tam pajahatha.
sn35.138:1.16: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati …pe…
sn35.138:1.18: Sa vo pahina hitaya sukhaya bhavissati …pe…
sn35.138:1.20: So vo pahino hitaya sukhaya bhavissati”ti.
